nodes.text: Star Wars: Episode I Obi-Wan's Adventures

Star Wars: Episode I Obi-Wan's Adventures is a video game released in 2000 for the Game Boy Color that retells the story of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace from the perspective of Obi-Wan Kenobi.

The plot closely follows the film, but does not include any of the Tatooine scenes. Instead, there are a mission detailing
the approach to Theed through a series of catacombs and Obi-Wan's mission aboard the Trade Federation landing craft. It is also the only game based on Episode I that allows the player to pilot a bongo.
